Trade/Device Name(s): LIAISON PLEX Gram-Negative Blood Culture Assay
Regulation Name(s): Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay For Identification Of Microorganisms And Resistance Markers From Positive Blood Cultures
Specimen Container(s): Blood culture bottles flagged positive by continuous monitoring systems
Methodologies: Target-specific mediator and nanoparticle probe hybridization
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Luminex LIAISON PLEX Gram-Negative Blood Culture Assay, a multiplexed qualitative in vitro diagnostic for detection/identification of gram-negative pathogens and resistance markers from positive blood cultures
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative multiplexed in vitro diagnostic for simultaneous detection and identification of selected gram-negative pathogens and resistance markers from positive blood culture bottles to aid in diagnosis of bacterial bloodstream infections, performed directly on blood culture media using blood culture bottles flagged positive for gram-negative bacteria by continuous monitoring system; for use in conjunction with clinical/lab findings and not intended for monitoring treatment
